Name: The Sunny Day 晴天
About the game: 【game introduction】 Game Name:The Sunny Day Game author: 殇葵(K.) Game type: Terrorist decryption Number of endings: 5 Customs clearance time: 3~5 hours 【Introduction to the game】: It seems to be a sunny day today. KUI always gets up and reads books, but her gracious smile is no longer hers. The red bedroom door, the discarded sunny doll, the disappearing sunflower petals... She found that the door in a corner was opened... [Note]: This work is a mystery puzzle, mainly puzzle solving and storytelling. There is a chase battle, but there is no big CG map of terrorism. Everyone can eat it with confidence. The elements of the game's storyline are relatively fragmented. Each level and item has its own special meaning. The complete storyline needs to be finalized after finishing, and it is more brain-burning. [Basic button] Move: arrow keys or small number pad Survey/confirmation: Z, space, carriage return Menu, Cancel: X, Esc Running: Shift Back to heading: F12
